metadata.Title: CVE-2019-25076 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium.
metadata.Description: The TSS (Tuple Space Search) algorithm in Open vSwitch 2.x through 2.17.2 and 3.0.0 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (delays of legitimate traffic) via crafted packet data that requires excessive evaluation time within the packet classification algorithm for the MegaFlow cache, aka a Tuple Space Explosion (TSE) attack.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> as of 2023-04-11, doesn't appear to be an upstream fix available for this issue.

criterions.comment: openvswitch package in jammy is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it.
